synopsis.text:
Rumi Inuyama and her beloved miniature poodle, Tetsunoshin, find themselves in the heart of Tokyo's luxurious Hoppongi Hills, a far cry from their humble roots in Kyushu. Rumi's father, a tech mogul, has relocated the family in pursuit of his ambition to become Japan's top IT company. However, beneath the glamorous facade lies a troubling reality: the Inuyama family is drowning in debt, and their extravagant spending habits are pushing them closer to bankruptcy.

Determined to save his family from financial ruin, Tetsunoshin teams up with the local Hill Dogs, led by the enigmatic schnauzer, Seto. With Seto's magical abilities, Tetsunoshin gains the power to transform into a human, becoming the dashing Celebrity Knight. In his new form, Tetsunoshin embarks on a mission to earn enough money to pay off the family's debts, navigating the challenges of the human world alongside his canine companions. As the Inuyama family's fate hangs in the balance, Tetsunoshin's journey promises laughter, adventure, and heartwarming camaraderie.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
